data.lyric:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!]
[ar:Dean Martin/Gus Levene]
[al:Baby, It's Cold Outside]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let It Snow, Let It Snow, Let It Snow (Remastered) - Dean Martin (迪安·马丁)
[00:03.83]Written by：Sammy Cahn/Jule Styne
[00:07.66]Oh the weather outside is frightful
[00:11.06]But the fire is so delightful
[00:14.48]And since we've no place to go
[00:17.33]
[00:18.13]Let it snow
[00:19.11]Let it snow
[00:20.07]Let it snow
[00:20.99]
[00:21.74]Man it doesn't show signs of stoppin'
[00:24.39]
[00:24.93]And I brought some corn for poppin'
[00:28.00]
[00:29.31]The lights are turned way down low
[00:31.57]
[00:32.31]Let it snow
[00:33.11]
[00:34.18]Let it snow
[00:35.44]
[00:36.13]When we finally kiss good night
[00:38.39]
[00:39.55]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[00:42.61]
[00:43.33]But if you really hold me tight
[00:45.88]
[00:46.94]All the way home I'll be warm
[00:49.44]
[00:50.07]And the fire is slowly dying
[00:52.94]
[00:53.66]And my dear
[00:54.67]We're still good bye ing
[00:57.23]But as long as you love me so
[00:59.97]
[01:00.69]Let it snow
[01:01.51]Let it snow
[01:02.41]And snow
[01:03.77]
[01:18.72]When we finally kiss good night
[01:21.47]
[01:22.06]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[01:25.26]
[01:25.77]But if you really grab me tight
[01:28.45]
[01:29.24]All the way home I'll be warm
[01:31.89]
[01:32.65]Oh the fire is slowly dying
[01:35.37]
[01:35.98]And my dear
[01:37.43]We're still good byeing
[01:38.88]
[01:39.70]But as long as you love me so
[01:42.34]
[01:43.16]Let it snow
[01:44.31]
[01:44.93]Let it snow
[01:46.71]Let it snow
